original: Carrick, Curt ’ Herbert, direktör, Kalmar, f. 16/2/14 i Sthlm av kons. H. A. C. o. Naèma Regnänder. G. 43 m. Margery Errington Hansen. Barn: Rolf f. 43. — Stud:ex. v. Lundsbergs sk. 34, hand:inst. 37-38. Res. t. Frankr. 35-37. Dir. i Kalmar Stufveri A-B o. Sthlms Rederi A-B Svea, Kal-markont. fr. 46.
translated: Carrick, Curt 'Herbert, director, Kalmar, b. 16/2/14 in Stockholm to Consul H.A.C. and Naèma Regnänder. Married in 1943 to Margery Errington Hansen. Children: Rolf b. 1943. - Graduated from Lundsbergs school in 1934, studied commerce from 1937-1938. Traveled to France from 1935-1937. Director of Kalmar Stufveri AB and Stockholm Rederi AB Svea, Kalmar accountant from 1946.
